attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS AN OWNER OF 3 4X4s,IT IS WITH SADNESS THAT MOST OF THE MEDIA ONLY MENTION 4X4s WHEN REPORTING ON ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES. DOES IT NOT OCCURE TO THESE PEOPLE THAT SOME 4X4s ARE MORE FUEL EFFECIANT THAN MANY OTHER VEHICLES.IF WE HAD ARRIVED FROM A NEW EU MEMBER COUNTRY, AND DID NOT LIKE WHAT WAS BEING SAID IT MAY BE CALLED DISCRIMINATION? IT IS TIME TO PRESENT ALL THE FACTS NOT JUST THE CONVIENT ONES.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
